Message.Text: Hey Frank! I just saw my students sharing code snippets on Snapchat. It's so great to see them collaborating!
Actually, Tommy, I think they’re using Discord for that.
Really? I thought they were all about Snapchat! It's amazing how they can use it for coding!
No, it’s definitely Discord. They have channels for coding discussions.
That’s even cooler! I love how they’re making the most of Snapchat for their projects!
Well, they’re utilizing Discord, but I guess it’s still awesome that they’re sharing ideas!
Exactly! Whatever platform they use, it’s great to see them engaged and excited about coding!
Absolutely! It’s all about the learning experience, right?
Right! Whether it’s Snapchat or Discord, they’re doing a fantastic job!
